import React,{useState}from'react';import{useNavigate}from'react-router-dom';import'./Login.css';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Login=()=>{const[role,setRole]=useState('Tanker');const[username,setUsername]=useState('');const[password,setPassword]=useState('');const navigate=useNavigate();const handleLogin=e=>{e.preventDefault();console.log('Role:',role);console.log('Username:',username);console.log('Password:',password);// Redirect based on role
